column4: was wondering if someone could help me...i'm trying to get the clam antivirus package, but i keep getting this error msg: "W: Failed to fetch http://ubuntu-backports.mirrormax.net/dists/hoary-backports/universe/binary-i386/libclamav1_0.85.1-2~5.04ubp1_i386.deb
404 Not Found" i know my sources.list file is typed right
double what nalioth said about backports
